architecture_overview: Dify's architecture comprises a frontend interface, backend services, and a database, with potential integration of external LLM services. The system processes user inputs, executes logic, and stores data securely.

components.name: Frontend
components.description: User-facing interface for interacting with the application

components.name: Backend API
components.description: Handles business logic, authentication, and request routing

components.name: Database
components.description: Stores application data including user information and session records

components.name: LLM Service
components.description: Provides large language model capabilities for AI-driven functionality

data_flows.description: User inputs and UI interactions are transmitted to the backend for processing
Processed data and session information is stored in the database
Request payloads are sent to the LLM service for AI processing
Processed results from the LLM service are returned to the backend
